message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000.  I think it's a fair price considering the benefits it will bring.
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your confidence in its value. I am willing to pay $12,000 for it.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but $12,000 is below what I can accept.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, I am able to offer $12,500 for the product.
